events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and are excited to begin the recruitment process.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's experience as a software developer with relevant skills.
A recruiter specialized in software and engineering roles has been assigned to guide the candidate through the recruitment stages.
The initial screening call was completed and the candidate showed strong knowledge and enthusiasm for the software development role.
The candidate responded promptly with additional information and confirmed availability for a technical interview next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess their coding and problem-solving abilities.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating excellent coding skills and clear technical understanding.
The HR interview was scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and company policies with the candidate.
The HR interview went well, with the candidate expressing strong interest in our values and team environment.
An offer was proposed to the candidate including a competitive salary and benefits package aligned with their experience.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed a start date in two weeks.
Onboarding process begun with documentation, access setup, and initial introductions to the engineering team.
Recruitment cycle successfully closed with candidate fully onboarded as a new software engineer on the team.
